page.title: 20CUMBRIAN RECIPES
page.content: CUMBERLAND STEW A delicious and simple winter meal made with vegetables (swede carrot onion to taste) mutton (minced or cut small) potatoes (sliced) and the secret ingredient black pudding. Skim the exess fat of the top before serving. Use salt and lots of pepper. RUM BUTTER Cream equal quantities soft brown sugar and unsalted butter. Add rum or brandy to taste to leave a solid consistency allowing to set. Serve as an accompaniment to steamed puddings. CUMBERLAND SAUSAGE As the Cumberland pig is now extinct the true magic is lost,however,take good quality pork (some say from a bacon pig),mince and season with lots of ground black pepper.Present in unlinked skins in a flat coil. Magic.
